ygData.subject: Grrrr (a request!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I have been using Heritirx on a lots of different machine recently and one thing that drives me mad is if java is not installed on a machine it just sits

Hi,

I have been using Heritirx on a lots of different machine recently  
and one thing that drives me mad is if java is not installed on a  
machine it just sits there printing "."'s rather than telling you  
there is no Java. I am not a shell script expert but if some one  
could add a "please install java" that would be nice (or just fail if  
it can't run it).

I know this happens almost never (except to me) but Heritrix is  
reaching 1.10 soon and it would add to the all round quality we see  
in other areas of the application :-)

cheers

mark
